description: Welcome a new Ph.D. student, Shuyu Gan, joining Minnesota NLP group in Fall 2025!
Zae Myung Kim won the Doctoral Dissertation Fellowship, focusing on meta-scaffolding of LLMs.
James Mooney won the Amazon MLSys Fellowship for 2025-2026. He works on algorithmic and agentic efficiency.
We are very grateful to invite Prof. Noah Smith as Cray Speaker series. Thank you for your wonderful talk and discussion, Noah!

Our alumni (visiting phd), Jaehyung Kim, completed his postdoc at CMU and started faculty position in Yonsei Univeristy. Congratulations, JK! Please contact him if you are interested in LLM alignment, adaptation, and personalization.

Our PhD students will be interning in different places over summer: Debarati Das at Microsoft Research, Zae Myung Kim at Amazon AGI, Shirley Anugrah Hayati at Amazon AGI, James Mooney at Grammarly Research, and Risako Owan at Intuit AI.
Congratulations, Shirley Anugrah Hayati and Zae Myung Kim for passing written and oral preliminary exams!
Congratulations to our new graduates: Amrutha Shetty (Masters), Aahan Tyagi (Masters), Ritik Parkar (Masters), Jong Inn Park (Masters), and London Lowmanstone (Masters)!
Amrutha Shetty's work is highlighted on the department website: CSpotlight: Learning The Wonders of Data Science
DK's NLP course holds final presentations (Group A, Group B).
Karin de Langis won the Doctoral Dissertation Fellowship!
Debarati Das passed her thesis proposal and will now be working on a mental health assistant project!
Zae Myung Kim is co-organizing the running of Textgroup, a reading group and academic community for people broadly interested in language.
Some of our recent work on writing assistant, human-vs-AI writing, and expert-level AI are featured in UMN CS
We had our first escape room lab event! (pic)
Ryan Koo Earns Honorable Mention for CRA Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Award
We submitted our first lab-wide project, <a href='https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.14698'>Under the Surface: Tracking the Artifactuality of LLM-Generated Data<a/>, to arxiv!
Jaehyung Kim (our visiting PhD student) got a postdoc offer from CMU LTI!
